com.acme.core

Class Teacher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acme.core.Teacher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Teacher>

    public class Teacher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Teacher>
    An abstract representation of an immutable Teacher.
    Author:
    Edward Liang, Carlos Gonzales

    • Constructor Summary

      Teacher(java.lang.String last, java.lang.String first, java.lang.String[] classes, java.lang.String[] classrooms)
      Creates a Teacher object from the given last name, first name, classes, and classrooms.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Teacher

        public Teacher(java.lang.String last,
       java.lang.String first,
       java.lang.String[] classes,
       java.lang.String[] classrooms)
        Creates a Teacher object from the given last name, first name, classes, and classrooms.
        Parameters:
        last - - The teacher's last name
        first - - The teacher's first name
        classes - - An array that holds the course names for this teacher, in order of period (period 1 course name then period 2 course name, etc)
        classrooms - - An array that holds the room numbers for this teacher, in order of period (period 1 room then period 2 room, etc)

    • Method Detail

      • getClasses

        public java.lang.String[] getClasses()
        Gets the course names for this teacher.
        Returns:
        A String array containing the course names for this teacher, with null indicating an empty period.

      • getRooms

        public java.lang.String[] getRooms()
        Gets the classrooms for this teacher.
        Returns:
        A String array containing the classrooms assigned to this teacher, with null indicating an empty period.

      • getFullName

        public java.lang.String getFullName()
        Gets the full name of this teacher.
        Returns:
        A String containing the teacher's full name in the form Last, First.
        A reversed implementation of calling toString() on this teacher.

      • getPeriods

        public java.lang.Boolean[] getPeriods()
        Gets the periods that this teacher is active/teaching.
        Returns:
        A Boolean array of length seven where true indicates that period is being taught.

      • getLastName

        public java.lang.String getLastName()
        Gets this teacher's last name.
        Returns:
        A String containing this teacher's last name.

      • getFirstName

        public java.lang.String getFirstName()
        Gets this teacher's first name.
        Returns:
        A String containing this teacher's first name.

      • isTeaching

        public boolean isTeaching(int period)
        Checks if this teacher teaches during the given period.
        Parameters:
        period - - The period to be checked
        Returns:
        false if period = 0 or this teacher does not teach during period, true if this teacher teaches during period.

      • fullInfo

        public java.lang.String fullInfo()
        Returns a multi-line String containing this teacher's name, classes, rooms, and period that he/she is teaching.
        Returns:
        a multi-line String containing all of this teacher's information

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A String representation of this teacher.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The String representation of this teacher in the form First Last.
        A reversed implementation of calling getFullName() on this teacher.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Teacher other)
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Teacher>
